Posts.Content: cherbert wrote: I am PaulaBeth's assistant, and I am so sorry to have to tell you that we lost her this last Saturday.  She had asked me to please post this in the event she did not make it through this last recurrence because she said it was very disconcerting for people to just disappear from the community and didn't want people to just keep worrying about her.  I am only sorry to have to tell you because we will all miss her terribly....she of course is now doing great because she is in heaven enjoying her new, cancer free body and dancing in the presence of Jesus! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: for friends of paulabeth cherbert CalGal

Posts.Content: May 6, 2008 07:58PM cherbert wrote: Thank you, all of you, for all the words of sympathy and love, and for your prayers. I will pass them on to the family. Thank you also for being a support network for PaulaBeth.  She was truly a special lady and anyone who ever had contact with her was blessed by it!
Posts.Title: for friends of paulabeth cherbert CalGal
